text: Digaula gaa gai godou huwa laagau mo godou meegai huogodoo, ga daaligi godou dama daane mono dama ahina. Digaula ga daaligi godou manu, kau, ga haga huaidu godou laagau ‘grape’, mo godou laagau ‘fig’. Nadau buini dauwa gaa oho godou waahale ala guu hau gi mau dangihi ala e hagadagadagagee ginai goodou.
